Anyone knows where I can find full english subtitles for this movie? By full I mean subs for both the english and the french scenes.

I'm from Brazil and I can watch american and english movies just fine but watching this damm french actors whispering bad english is torture - i can't understand anything.
Thank you so much ! I love LES VAMPIRES and anything connected.
